sentences.en: All the battleships can refresh in this harbor.
sentences.cn: 所有战舰都能在这个港口装上补充供应品。

sentences.en: At that time, our ship was tied up at this harbor.
sentences.cn: 当时我们的船停靠在这个港口.

sentences.en: He had jumped overboard in New York harbor and swum to shore.
sentences.cn: 他在纽约港跳下船，游上了岸。

sentences.en: I made my way towards the harbor.
sentences.cn: 我朝港口的方向走.

sentences.en: It is the harbor of Athens.
sentences.cn: 它是雅典的港口城。

sentences.en: She stands on a small island in New York harbor, near the great city.
sentences.cn: 她竖立在纽约海港的一座小岛，并紧挨着纽约这座大城市。

sentences.en: The attack will take off from our position near the harbor.
sentences.cn: 此次攻击将从我们在港口附近的阵地上发动.

sentences.en: The boats in the harbor make a beautiful scene.
sentences.cn: 港内的船只构成了美丽的景色.

sentences.en: The gale screamed through the harbor.
sentences.cn: 强风呼啸着吹过港口.

sentences.en: The harbor gradually filled in.
sentences.cn: 港口渐渐淤塞了.

sentences.en: The harbor lies to the south of the city.
sentences.cn: 港口在城市的南边.

sentences.en: The Harbor was replete with boats.
sentences.cn: 港口里满是船只。

sentences.en: The light guided them back to the harbor.
sentences.cn: 灯光引导他们返回港口.

sentences.en: The ship was closing down on the harbor.
sentences.cn: 那艘船正接近港口.

sentences.en: The ship was lying to outside the harbor.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停泊在港湾外.

sentences.en: The steamer arrived in harbor last night.
sentences.cn: 汽船是昨晚进港的.

sentences.en: Try to steer the boat for the harbor.
sentences.cn: 设法把船驶向港湾.

sentences.en: When the bombs fell on our harbor and tyranny threatened the world, she was there to witness a generation rise to greatness and a democracy was saved. Yes, we can.
sentences.cn: 二战时期，炸弹降临我们的海港上空，全世界受到独裁专制的威胁，她见证了美 国一代人的伟大崛起，他们拯救了民主。是的，我们能。

sentences.en: With great skill, he piloted the boat into the little harbor.
sentences.cn: 凭借高超的技术, 他引导这艘船驶进这窄小的港口.

sentences.en: Would you like a seat with a harbor view?
sentences.cn: 您喜欢能看到海港景色的座位吗？

words.tran_cn: 居住，生存；入港停泊；躲藏

phrases.tran_cn: 珍珠港（美国夏威夷港口）

trans.tran_cn: 海港，海湾，避难所，躲藏处
隐匿； 窝藏， 包庇
心怀，庇护，避入安全地，（船）入港停泊
